	Ensure proper space management and stacking of goods in the designated spaces.
	Any other responsibility that may be assigned by Management.

	2-3 years of experience in warehouse management or inventory control in healthcare sector is an added advantage.
	Certified Supply Chain Professional (CSCP) or the Certified Warehouse Professional (CWP).
	Emotionally Intelligent and culturally sensitive
	Highly motivated, dynamic, and customer-oriented with the ability to thrive in a competitive and ever-changing environment.


Method of Application&nbsp;

We manufacture different drugs for improve livestock&rsquo;s health. Our product is specially tailored to suit the environmental sustainability of livestock&rsquo;s within Nigeria. Our animal health products undergo rigorous quality control to be certified fit for use on farm animals.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Satisfaction Representative (Sales of Poultry Pharmaceutical)

Job Locations:&nbsp;Abia and Delta
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	The&nbsp;Customer Satisfaction Representative&nbsp;is a sales-oriented role responsible for driving customer retention, expanding product adoption, and building brand loyalty through exceptional relationship management and technical sales support.
	The role ensures that poultry farmers, veterinary officers, agri-dealers, and distributors derive maximum value from Diversay


Key Responsibilities
Sales and Account Retention:


	Actively follow up with existing customers to ensure repeat sales and promote product reorders.
	Upsell and cross-sell relevant vaccines, medications, and animal health products based on customer needs.
	Maintain a portfolio of key accounts and ensure consistent contact, visits, and relationship growth.
	Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets for assigned territories.


Post-Sales Support and Satisfaction:


	Ensure customers receive prompt delivery, proper cold chain handling, and accurate product instructions.
	Monitor product usage and efficacy post-sale; gather feedback for internal technical and product teams.
	Provide field-level customer support and liaise with the technical team to address usage-related queries or complaints.
	Resolve product or service issues quickly to ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty.


Field Engagement and Relationship Management:


	Conduct farm and distributor visits regularly to build rapport, assess product performance, and reinforce trust.
	Organize farm demos, mini-clinics, and customer education sessions on best practices.
	Represent the company at trade fairs, farmers&rsquo; forums, and veterinary association meetings within the region.


Feedback and Market Intelligence:


	Capture and report on customer satisfaction levels, competitor activity, market pricing, and industry trends.
	Recommend improvements in sales strategies or product delivery based on real-time customer feedback.
	Monitor churn risks and take proactive steps to prevent customer loss.


Reporting and Documentation:


	Maintain accurate records of interactions, follow-ups, and sales in CRM or reporting templates.
	Submit timely weekly, monthly, and quarterly activity reports to the Regional Sales Manager.
	Track KPIs such as customer retention rate, complaint resolution time, and repeat sales conversion.


Qualifications and Experience


	HND / B.Sc. in Animal Health, Veterinary Science, Agriculture, Biological Sciences, or related disciplines.
	0 - 4 years of experience in veterinary pharmaceutical sales, animal health product marketing, or technical customer service in agri-business.
	Solid understanding of poultry farming systems, animal diseases, and vaccination programs.
	Must be fluent in English and Yoruba (or other major South West languages).
	Ability to drive (valid driver&rsquo;s license required) and willingness to travel extensively within the region.
	Strong sales orientation and ability to meet revenue goals.


Key Competencies:


	Excellent negotiation and persuasive selling skills
	Strong relationship management and interpersonal skills
	Commercial and customer service mindset
	Ability to translate technical knowledge into customer value
	Organized, self-motivated, and goal-driven
	Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and basic CRM tools.

	Customer Obsession: Always seeks to add value to the customer&rsquo;s experience
	Drive for Results: Consistently meets or exceeds sales and retention targets
	Integrity: Handles business ethically and builds trust with all stakeholders
	Collaboration: Works across teams to deliver holistic customer service
	Adaptability: Quickly adjusts approach based on field realities or customer needs
	Resilience: Maintains energy and focus even under pressure or after setbacks.


Method of Application&nbsp;

  "description": "Kuddy Cosmetics exemplifies sustainable, homegrown success in Nigeria&rsquo;s beauty sector&mdash;rising from a suitcase startup to a national brand with a loyal following, original product lines, extensive retail outlets, and digital innovation. Kudirat Fashola&rsquo;s journey reflects tenacity, entrepreneurial ingenuity, and a vision that continues to shape Africa&rsquo;s cosmetics industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Content Creator / Social Media Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Tradefair, Amuwo Odofin - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time&nbsp;(Hybrid 3 days onsite)
Gender: Female (for gender balance)

Description


	A cosmetic store is looking for a creative, organized, and trend-savvy Content Creator / Social Media Manager to help us grow our online community and bring our brand story to life across all digital platforms.
	The Content Creator / Social Media Manager will be responsible for developing, executing, and managing the brand&rsquo;s online presence from creating high-quality visual and written content to engaging audiences and driving brand awareness, loyalty, and sales.


Responsibilties
The Social Media Manager / Content Creator will:


	Develop, execute and manage the social media strategy across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok,) to build the brand, engage customers and drive foot?traffic and online sales.
	Create high?quality visual and written content (photos, videos, reels, stories, captions) aligned with our brand voice in beauty, skincare and makeup.
	Work closely with marketing, store teams and product teams to highlight new launches, promotions, in-store events, tutorials, customer testimonials.
	Monitor, analyze and report on key metrics (engagement, reach, conversion) and use insights to optimize content and campaigns.
	Stay up to date on trends in beauty, social media, Nigeria &amp; African market, and propose creative ideas to keep our content fresh and relevant.
	Manage community engagement: respond to comments/messages, moderate discussions, build relationships with ambassadors/influencers.
	Coordinate with external creators/influencers when needed.
	Design and implement a monthly social media content calendar.


Requirements / Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Marketing, Communications, Media, or related field (or equivalent experience).
	Proven experience (2&ndash;4 years or more) managing social media &amp; content for a brand (ideally in retail/beauty/fashion).
	Strong portfolio of content creation: social posts, videos, perhaps previous beauty/cosmetics work.
	Excellent visual storytelling skills: photography, video shooting, editing
	Good writing skills for social captions, blog?type posts, brand tone.
	Deep understanding of social platforms, current trends (especially Reels/TikTok/Shorts), algorithm changes, hashtags, engagement tactics


Salary
N150,000 monthly.

Method of Application&nbsp;
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and&nbsp;portfolio to:&nbsp;careers@kuddycosmetics.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

Kudirat Fashola’s journey reflects tenacity, entrepreneurial ingenuity, and a vision that continues to shape Africa’s cosmetics industry.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator / Social Media Manager

Job Location: Tradefair, Amuwo Odofin - Lagos

Description

	A cosmetic store is looking for a creative, organized, and trend-savvy Content Creator / Social Media Manager to help us grow our online community and bring our brand story to life across all digital platforms.
	The Content Creator / Social Media Manager will be responsible for developing, executing, and managing the brand’s online presence from creating high-quality visual and written content to engaging audiences and driving brand awareness, loyalty, and sales.


Responsibilties
The Social Media Manager / Content Creator will:


	Develop, execute and manage the social media strategy across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, TikTok,) to build the brand, engage customers and drive foot?traffic and online sales.
	Create high?quality visual and written content (photos, videos, reels, stories, captions) aligned with our brand voice in beauty, skincare and makeup.
	Work closely with marketing, store teams and product teams to highlight new launches, promotions, in-store events, tutorials, customer testimonials.
	Monitor, analyze and report on key metrics (engagement, reach, conversion) and use insights to optimize content and campaigns.
	Stay up to date on trends in beauty, social media, Nigeria & African market, and propose creative ideas to keep our content fresh and relevant.
	Manage community engagement: respond to comments/messages, moderate discussions, build relationships with ambassadors/influencers.
	Coordinate with external creators/influencers when needed.
	Design and implement a monthly social media content calendar.


Requirements / Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Communications, Media, or related field (or equivalent experience).
	Proven experience (2–4 years or more) managing social media & content for a brand (ideally in retail/beauty/fashion).
	Strong portfolio of content creation: social posts, videos, perhaps previous beauty/cosmetics work.
	Excellent visual storytelling skills: photography, video shooting, editing
	Good writing skills for social captions, blog?type posts, brand tone.
	Deep understanding of social platforms, current trends (especially Reels/TikTok/Shorts), algorithm changes, hashtags, engagement tactics


Salary
N150,000 monthly.

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Warehouse Manager",
  "description": "J3 is an FMCG distributor. We have been in existence over 8 years. J3 has branches in several locations; Lagos, Ibadan, Ogun, Ondo, and Osun state.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Warehouse Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Iyana Ipaja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description


	The Head of Warehouse is responsible for the overall supervision, coordination, and strategic direction of warehouse operations across all outlets.
	This includes overseeing Warehouse Supervisors, ensuring operational consistency, driving efficiency, enforcing compliance with SOPs, and improving warehouse performance across the business.


Key Responsibilities
Supervision and Coordination:


	Supervise and provide leadership to all Warehouse Supervisors across outlets.
	Conduct weekly review meetings and performance debriefs with each Warehouse Supervisor and address gaps.
	Conduct regular site visits to assess warehouse conditions, team performance, and compliance. Inventory Oversight
	Ensure real-time stock accuracy across all warehouses through strict supervision.
	Approve and coordinate monthly physical stock counts and unplanned spot checks.
	Analyze stock movement trends to recommend inventory optimization strategies.
	Enforce FIFO (First-In, First-Out) and FEFO (First Expiry, First-Out) principles.
	Investigate and resolve major stock variances (theft, damage, system errors).
	Track slow-moving and expiring stock; investigate and resolve significant variances due to theft, damage, or system errors.


Strategic Warehouse Management:


	Develop and enforce standard operating procedures (SOPs) for all warehouse activities.
